hero.title: Safety School Project
hero.subtitle: School Security with Method and Protocol

intro.title: What is Safety School?
intro.description: The Safety School Project is a complete and methodological solution in school security, going beyond the simple presence of guards. It is an integrated system that combines intelligent access control, emergency protocols, continuous training and prevention culture to ensure a truly safe school environment.

context.title: Why does your school need Safety School?
context.subtitle: The context of insecurity in Brazilian schools

items.title: Physical and Psychological Violence
items.description: Assaults, intimidations and conflicts within the school environment

items.title: Bullying and Cyberbullying
items.description: Growing cases of harassment and violence among students

items.title: Weapon Entry
items.description: Real risk of dangerous objects inside schools

items.title: Real Cases
items.description: Tragedies like Realengo (RJ) and other school attacks

objective.title: Project Objective
objective.description: Ensure a safe, organized school environment prepared for emergencies, with clear protocols, trained staff and consolidated prevention culture.

items.title: Intelligent Access Control
items.description: Rigorous entry and exit management with identification, registration and security protocols. Backpack inspection, visitor control and perimeter monitoring.

items.title: Monitoring and Response
items.description: Strategically positioned inspectors, defined emergency protocols, integrated communication and rapid response to any occurrence.

items.title: Prevention Culture
items.description: Continuous training of school staff, periodic drills, awareness lectures and construction of participatory security environment.

steps.title: Diagnosis and Risk Map
steps.description: Complete analysis of school environment, identification of vulnerabilities and creation of personalized risk map.

steps.title: Protocols by Scenario
steps.description: Development of specific procedures for each type of emergency: fire, invasion, accident, among others.

steps.title: Team Training
steps.description: Training of inspectors, employees and teachers in security protocols and first aid.

steps.title: Periodic Drills
steps.description: Regular practical exercises to test protocols and prepare the entire school community.

steps.title: Reports and Records
steps.description: Detailed documentation of occurrences, data analysis and continuous process improvement.

items.title: Inspectors who ARE the Protocol
items.description: Professionals trained to rigorously follow and apply procedures, not just watch.

items.title: Emergency Training
items.description: Training in first aid, fire fighting and crisis management.

items.title: Proven Experience
items.description: Team with military and police training applied to school environment.

items.title: Humanized Approach
items.description: Security that respects the educational environment and contributes to positive school climate.
